params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.ipv4_enabled
params.description: Whether the instance is assigned a public IP address or not.

params.name: data.private_network
params.description: The resource link for the VPC network from which the Cloud SQL instance is accessible for private IP. For example, /projects/myProject/global/networks/default. This setting can be updated, but it cannot be removed after it is set.

params.name: data.require_ssl
params.description: Whether SSL connections over IP are enforced or not.

params.name: data.authorized_networks
params.description: The list of external networks that are allowed to connect to the instance using the IP. In 'CIDR' notation, also known as 'slash' notation (for example: 192.168.100.0/24).
